list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: - Add Register Card: 1. Get Firmware State 2. Check Update State 3. Get Private Key State 4. Card Register State - Add Bluetooth state change - Add Location State change

task.summary: 1. Implement initial state - Declaration all machine state constants (initial,card discover.....). - Declaration current_state, isCardRegistered, BLEStatus & Set default. value in share preference for the very first time we install App. - Check if card is register than change current state to 2000, else change state to 1000. - Register BLE State change event. - Set BLE State base on bluetooth status.
1. Add Discover Device Screen - List all nearby device 2. Add BootComplete Broadcast Receiver - Set current to initial state - Check isCardRegistered then change state 3. Design UI for Main screen
- Add Register Card: 1. Get Firmware State 2. Check Update State 3. Get Private Key State 4. Card Register State - Add Bluetooth state change - Add Location State change
